files.help:
XDG_CONFIG_HOME/emacs/init.el
Legacy paths have precedence over XDG paths.  Emacs will never create XDG_CONFIG_HOME/emacs/.
Workaround for 26.3 or older: It's possible to set HOME, but it has unexpected side effects.

XDG_CONFIG_HOME/emacs/init.el
Legacy paths have precedence over XDG paths.  Emacs will never create XDG_CONFIG_HOME/emacs/.
Workaround for 26.3 or older: It's possible to set HOME, but it has unexpected side effects.
